name: Lympid
description: Lympid is a regulatory-compliant platform to issue and trade premium RWAs: Horses, Art, Luxury Watches, US Treasuries, Real Estate, and much more. Lympid is Redefining Investment with Tokenized Premium RWAs Introduction Lympid, a pioneering platform that unlocks the doors to exclusive premium assets, making them accessible to everyone. Rooted in robust regulatory compliance, Lympid is revolutionizing how we perceive and engage with Real World Assets (RWAs). With a mission to democratize wealth, the platform allows investors to trade fractionalized and tokenized assets ranging from competition horses and luxury watches to U.S. Treasuries, fine art, real estate, fine wines and beyond. Why Lympid? Lympid eliminates the barriers that have historically reserved premium asset investments for the ultra-wealthy. Through fractionalization, tokenization and trading, the platform enables investments starting at just $30, empowering anyone to enter markets previously dominated by the elite. With bank-grade security and neo-bank simplicity, Lympid seamlessly blends trust, accessibility, and innovation.
